name: cpptools
description: C/C++ IntelliSense, debugging, and code browsing.

walkthroughs.title: Get Started with C++ Development
walkthroughs.description: Your first steps to set up powerful C++ tools in a lightweight, performant editor!

steps.title: Install a C++ compiler
steps.description: The C++ extension uses the C++ compiler on your computer to configure IntelliSense for your project. [Check for C++ compilers](command:C_Cpp.CheckForCompiler)

media.altText: markdown file with instructions for installing Clang on macOS

steps.title: Install a C++ compiler
steps.description:
The C++ extension uses the C++ compiler on your computer to configure IntelliSense for your project. 
[Check for C++ compilers](command:C_Cpp.CheckForCompiler)

media.altText: markdown file with instructions for installing GCC on Linux

steps.title: Install a C++ compiler
steps.description:
The C++ extension uses the C++ compiler on your computer to configure IntelliSense for your project. 
[Check for C++ compilers](command:C_Cpp.CheckForCompiler)

media.altText: markdown file with instructions for installing MSVC on Windows

steps.title: Open your project
steps.description:
Open an existing folder that contains your C++ project, or create a new folder. 
[Open Folder...](command:workbench.action.files.openFolder)

media.altText: screenshot that shows a C++ project opened in the file Explorer

steps.title: Configure C++ IntelliSense
steps.description:
Verify important IntelliSense settings like Compiler Path, Compiler Args, IntelliSense Mode, and Include Path. 
[Open IntelliSense Configuration...](command:C_Cpp.ConfigurationEditUI?-2)

media.altText: screenshot that shows IntelliSense configurations UI with important settings highlighted

steps.title: Build your C++ project
steps.description:
Create a default build task for your project. 
[Learn more](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/cpp/config-clang-mac#_build-helloworldcpp)

media.altText: markdown file with instructions for configuring default build task on Mac with Clang

steps.title: Build your C++ project
steps.description:
Create a default build task for your project. 
[Learn more](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/cpp/config-linux#_build-helloworldcpp)

media.altText: markdown file with instructions for configuring default build task on Linux with GCC

steps.title: Build your C++ project
steps.description:
Create a default build task for your project. 
[Learn more](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/cpp/config-msvc#_build-helloworldcpp)

media.altText: markdown file with instructions for configuring default build task on MSVC with Windows

steps.title: Run and debug your C++ project
steps.description:
Create a debug configuration for your project. 
[Learn more](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/cpp/config-clang-mac#_debug-helloworldcpp)

media.altText: markdown file with instructions for starting a debugging session on macOS

steps.title: Run and debug your C++ project
steps.description:
Create a debug configuration for your project. 
[Learn more](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/cpp/config-linux#_debug-helloworldcpp)

media.altText: markdown file with instructions for starting a debugging session on Linux

steps.title: Run and debug your C++ project
steps.description:
Create a debug configuration for your project. 
[Learn more](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/cpp/config-msvc#_debug-helloworldcpp)

media.altText: markdown file with instructions for starting a debugging session on Windows

steps.title: Install CMake Tools
steps.description:
Do you build your project with CMake? Install the CMake Tools extension to seamlessly build and debug CMake project. 
[Install CMake Tools...](command:workbench.extensions.installExtension?%22ms-vscode.cmake-tools%22)

media.altText: screenshot of CMake Tools extension page

steps.title: Lean back and get started
steps.description:
Watch this series of short and practical videos about setting up C++ IntelliSense, building, and debugging C++ projects. 
[Watch Tutorials](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/cpp/introvideos-cpp)

media.altText: screenshot with preview of video tutorial and play button

viewsWelcome.contents: To learn more about launch.json, see [Configuring C/C++ debugging](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/cpp/launch-json-reference).
viewsWelcome.when: debugStartLanguage == cpp || debugStartLanguage == c || debugStartLanguage == cuda-cpp

keybindings.when: editorLangId == 'c' && editorTextFocus || editorLangId == 'cpp' && editorTextFocus || editorLangId == 'cuda-cpp' && editorTextFocus

semanticTokenTypes.description: A C++ new or delete operator.

semanticTokenModifiers.description: Annotates a symbol that is declared in global scope.
Annotates a symbol that is declared in local scope.

scripts.compile: node ./tools/prepublish.js && gulp generate-native-strings && gulp translations-generate && webpack --mode production --env vscode_nls
scripts.compile-watch: node ./tools/prepublish.js && gulp generate-native-strings && gulp translations-generate && webpack --mode production --env vscode_nls --watch --progress
